steps.title: Step 1: Request a Custom Quote
steps.description: Tell us about your project—site size, fencing type, delivery timing—and we’ll send a tailored estimate that fits your needs.

steps.title: Step 2: Schedule & Confirm
steps.description: Once you approve the quote, we’ll coordinate delivery, walk you through any prep work, and make sure the site is ready for setup.

steps.title: Step 3: Professional Installation
steps.description: Our experienced crew shows up on time, installs your fencing to spec, and ensures it’s secure, level, and meets all safety standards.

steps.title: Step 4: Prompt Pickup
steps.description: When your rental term ends, we return to remove everything cleanly and efficiently—leaving your site just how we found it.
